Developers : Nicola Salmoria and the MAME Team Initial release : February 5, 1997 Website : http://mamedev.org/ Written in : C++
M.A.M.E is an emulator application designed to recreate the hardware of arcade game systems in software on modern personal computers and other platforms. The intention is to preserve gaming history by preventing vintage games from being lost or forgotten.
